articles.content: COURCHEVEL, France -- Mikaela Shiffrin won skiing's overall World Cup title for the fourth time Thursday, fueled by speed races that turned her expected duel with Petra Vlhová into a runaway success.… [+2380 chars]

articles.title: Real Madrid’s opponents in the Champions League Quarterfinals Draw ranked - Managing Madrid
articles.description: Many elite teams in this draw, who should Real Madrid want to avoid?
articles.content: The last draw of the 2021-2022 edition of the UEFA Champions League will take place this Friday, with the Quarterfinals and also the following Semifinals being scheduled. Real Madrid will be there af… [+4086 chars]
